name: Actias: The Path of Light
description:
Little moth, Suraci, has been chosen to go on a quest to find their path of light. 

Help them through their journey by lighting up the matches along the way, avoiding dangerous hazards, and gliding past the gaps in the paths...

(Controls: WASD, spacebar, ENTER)
If the game controls do not work upon the first load, please try reloading the page again.

(A bug is preventing players to pass the tutorial level. Apologies about that.)
